name: Balloon Stand
description:
How to play:

Collect all four balloons in each randomly generated stage to advance. Avoid the crows. If you collect both bonus items on a stage without failing, you'll get a perfect bonus. Don't forget that you can't scroll back down! The game doesn't end until you run out of lives, so go for a high score!

This game can also be played on a real NES! A ROM download is included.

Made for the 2022 NESDev Compo.
